notes: This manifest tracks Tier-0 canonical protocols for Living Agent System v5.0.0
All protocols have CS2-only modification authority
Baseline validation required in agent wake-up phase
Memory hierarchy: Constitutional → Wave → Session → Learning
Wave planning includes complexity assessment and subwave decomposition
